text:
They came into contact with an illegally electrified fence near Krishnagiri on Wednesday. — Photo: Special Arrangement

Two female elephants were killed in the Setteri dam area near the Vellore-Krishnagiri border after they came into contact with an illegally electrified fence around a coconut grove in the early hours on Wednesday Page 6
title: Two elephants electrocuted in Setteri dam area
